title: GET_CONVAR
content:
0x6CCD2564// GetConvar
char* GET_CONVAR(char* varName, char* default_);Parameters:varName: The console variable to look up.default_: The default value to set if none is found.Returns: Returns the convar value if it can be found, otherwise it returns the assigned default.Can be used to get a console variable of type char*, for example a string.Examples:Luaif GetConvar('voice_useNativeAudio', 'false') == 'true' then
    Citizen.Trace('Native Audio is enabled.')
end
codeBlocks:
// GetConvar
char* GET_CONVAR(char* varName, char* default_);

if GetConvar('voice_useNativeAudio', 'false') == 'true' then
    Citizen.Trace('Native Audio is enabled.')
end
